response.original_title: Camel - Pressure Points Live At The Hammersmith Odeon
response.overview: Recorded live at the Hammersmith Odeon in London on May 11, 1984, during Camel's "Stationary Traveller" tour, this performance captures the band at a pivotal moment in their career. The concert features a blend of tracks from their then-new album, including "Pressure Points," "Refugee," and "Stationary Traveller," alongside classic pieces like "Rhayader," "Rhayader Goes to Town," and "Lady Fantasy." Notably, former member Peter Bardens joins the band on stage for the encore, adding a nostalgic touch to the performance. This version, included in the 2023 boxset Air Born: The MCA & Decca Years 1973â€“1984, presents the complete concert across two CDs and a Blu-ray, offering fans both remastered audio and the full video experience of this memorable show.
response.title: Camel - Pressure Points Live At The Hammersmith Odeon
